previewArticle.title: Seattle Sounders FC vs. LA Galaxy | MLS Cup Playoffs Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Seattle Sounders 2, LA Galaxy 1 | MLS Cup Playoffs Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Landon Donovan shot is saved by Stefan Frei on a breakaway.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Stefan Frei denies Landon Donovan alone on the break

timelineItems.desc: The LA Galaxy are presented the Western Conference Championship trophy after beating the Seattle Sounders
timelineItems.title: TROPHY: The LA Galaxy are presented the Western Conference Championship trophy

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: KICKTV
timelineItems.text: Seattle's tifo game is always second to none. #SEAvLA http://t.co/GjfeQHGp5W

timelineItems.name: Preston Padgett
timelineItems.text: Sounders playing sloppy. Come on boys. @LIVESounders #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: Seattle looks more prepared in terms of outerwear. Long sleeves and gloves? I guess they don't make those in LA. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Robbie Keane tries an ambitious volley from long range

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  LA Galaxy. Conceded by Zach Scott.

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Props to any player who heads the ball tonight. That thing has got to be like a 30 degree rock boulder. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Robbie Rogers.
Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: Galaxy finding ample space in between midfield and defense. Seattle D-MIDs need to hang back #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Nick Fox
timelineItems.text: #MLSPlayoffs Galaxy looking slightly more organized early. If Seattle concede early, all the air will go out of this building. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).
Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Offside, Seattle Sounders FC. Clint Dempsey tries a through ball, but Lamar Neagle is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Chris McClees
timelineItems.text: Alonso is not well. But that doesn't mean we have to play long ball, right? String some positive passes together, fellas! #ebfg #sounders

timelineItems.name: Sean Strife
timelineItems.text: Most of the action keeping #Sounders on their heels thus far. I like it. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: How many minutes till Alonso gets subbed out? #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Sean Maslin
timelineItems.text: Martins ball handling has been poor thus far. #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Sam Kennedy
timelineItems.text: Neagle looks afraid. Not good. #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Drawing The Foul
timelineItems.text: Zach Scott is going to make a big mistake in this game. #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box misses to the right. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: Michael DePriest
timelineItems.text: #Zardes is reading a completely different book than the rest of #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.desc: Cross by DeAndre Yedlin is saved by Jaime Penedo of the LA Galaxy.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: DeAndre Yedlin cross is snagged by Jaime Penedo

timelineItems.name: W. Knutt Megg Esq.
timelineItems.text: Ok FIFA, the midfield is rendered. How about the goals? #SEAvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Omar González (LA Galaxy).
Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Laura Beshire
timelineItems.text: a beautiful night for MLS playoffs in Seattle. #ebfg

timelineItems.name: Sarah Lerner
timelineItems.text: Smart of LA to be aggressive to start. A goal means the Sounders have to score 3 to advance. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: J-Rom
timelineItems.text: And we start #seavla

timelineItems.name: Jhony Gutierrez
timelineItems.text: The good news for the #LAGalaxy defense is that Omar Gonzalez is still rocking that gnarly beard, which is like an extra defender.

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: There looks to be 2 square patches of turf at midfield by the near touch line. Not sure what that's about. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: It's cold. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Juli C
timelineItems.text: Let's ROLL! #GoodPlayoffKarma #SEAvLA Go @soundersfc! ⚽️⚽️

timelineItems.name: Sasha Schtowchan
timelineItems.text: #SEAvLA Commentators need to stop talking about Alonso not being fit. Doesn't Ross Fletcher know Honey Badger don't care.

timelineItems.name: Sean Steffen
timelineItems.text: LA already collecting low percentage shots like it's going out of style. #SeavLA

timelineItems.comment: Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lamar Neagle (Seattle Sounders FC).
Match ends, Seattle Sounders FC 2, LA Galaxy 1.

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: The #LAGalaxy hold on despite a lot of nervy moments. Massive half by the #LAGalaxy defense -- especially Omar Gonzalez.

timelineItems.name: phil collin
timelineItems.text: Juninho's away goal in the 54th minute the difference. #LAGalaxy will try to win record 5th #MLSCup title Sunday at home vs. New England

timelineItems.name: Josh Karadeema
timelineItems.text: LA Galaxy advance to the MLS Cup final on away goals. Donovan has one game left in his career. Would be a storybook ending #MLSCup #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Christian Valdivia
timelineItems.text: MLS CUP #lagalaxy #LD

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: You can see what it means to @landondonovan. #SEAvLA http://t.co/7oDUSo6nEB

timelineItems.desc: The LA Galaxy and Seattle Sounders conclude their heady end-of-season rivalry with the deciding match in the Western Conference Championship of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T, Sunday at CenturyLink Field.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Seattle Sounders vs LA Galaxy | November 30, 2014

timelineItems.desc:
Seattle Sounders Captain Brad Evans reacts following the loss to the LA Galaxy.

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: "We live to fight for next year." - Brad Evans | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham catches up with Omar Gonzalez following LA Galaxy' Western Conference Championship victory.

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: "We wanted to host another MLS Cup and we found a way to do it." - Omar Gonzalez | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.desc:
Former MLS Player and coach Jesse Marsch takes a look at the key plays and decisions in the Western Conference Championship Leg 2 between the Seattle Sounders and the LA Galaxy.

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: Jesse Marsch breaks down Seattle Sounders vs. LA Galaxy Leg 2 | 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs

timelineItems.desc: MLSsoccer.com’s Jason Saghini and Greg Lalas recap Leg 2 of the Western Conference Championship, with a post game reaction from Landon Donovan.
timelineItems.title: Seattle Sounders vs. LA Galaxy Leg 2 Recap | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.desc:
MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham catches up with Juninho following LA Galaxy' Western Conference Championship victory.

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: REACTION: Juninho happy to have seized the moment for the Galaxy | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.desc: We head to Century Link Field to take a glimpse and the sights and sounds from the Western Conference Championship Leg 2 match between the Seattle Sounders and the LA Galaxy.
timelineItems.title: Born in 1974: The faces of #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Phil West
timelineItems.text: Yedlin almost made up for 20 minutes of general Sounders bumbling with one brilliant one-on-two play there #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Scott Cannon
timelineItems.text: This field reminds me of a video game when it goes into hyper drive. #MLS #SEAvLA

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Dan Gargan (LA Galaxy).
Lamar Neagle (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Sam Kennedy
timelineItems.text: I'm glad this Yedlin showed up and not the other one we've seen. He'll be important tonight. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: This game is a sloppy mess (22'). #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Bank shot! #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/9KWkfaPH7q

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: A. Danger Lenny
timelineItems.text: It's cool to be fast, but not if you're sloppy and turn the ball over every time you touch it. Sounders look dreadful. #SEAvLA #MLSCup

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 23’: Dan Gargan is whistled for a foul riiiiiiiiiiight on the edge of the box. http://t.co/iUhC5bPMBx #SEAvLA http://t.co/Ainkv243Um

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: Maybe a little soft but Gargan did outstretch his leg there. Certainly a foul. Nimble from Neagle. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Seattle Sounders FC 1, LA Galaxy 0. Brad Evans (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from very close range to the high center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Brad Evans smashes one home to level the aggregate score

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Stefan Ishizaki (LA Galaxy).
Leonardo González (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt blocked. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) right footed shot from a difficult angle on the right is blocked. Assisted by Obafemi Martins.

timelineItems.name: Jeff Milby
timelineItems.text: Rather than just keeping it simple and keep possession guys are thinking it forward or trying eye-of-the-needle stuff. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Mike McCall
timelineItems.text: That free kick was far from Dempsey's best. Really no ignoring that he and Martins have under-delivered in the playoffs thus far. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.desc: MLSsoccer.com's Katie Witham and Jesse Marsch dissect the matchup between LA Galaxy and the Seattle Sounders, including how players who didn't feature in the first leg might make a difference.
timelineItems.title: Will Ozzie Alonso be fit enough to make a difference? | MLS Now

timelineItems.name: Mike Firpo
timelineItems.text: Just what this 2nd leg needed. Game on. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Brad Evans! Series is tied 1-1: http://t.co/x5pGMvL0TH #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: JMazz
timelineItems.text: Well that was a bit against the run of play. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from the center of the box is high and wide to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Obafemi Martins can't convert a great chance in front of goal

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Seattle Sounders FC. Brad Evans tries a through ball, but Clint Dempsey is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: KICKTV
timelineItems.text: GOAL SOUNDERS! WE HAVE OURSELVES A SOCCER GAME! #SEAvLA

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.
Attempt missed. Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Clint Dempsey.

timelineItems.name: Kristin C. Radko
timelineItems.text: Wouldn't have happened with Delagarza back there..#SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Gotta fault Omar and Gargan for ball watching on the goal. Lost track of track of Dempsey. Too slow to react. #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Murray
timelineItems.text: Cliche, but that goal has changed everything for the Sounders. Huge confidence boost. #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: You Can Always Count On Us (c/o @KICKTV). #SEAvLA http://t.co/VZSMOpYHkJ

timelineItems.name: David Houston
timelineItems.text: I was sure Martins was going to sniper that one home. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Lamar Neagle (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Leonardo González.

timelineItems.name: KICKTV
timelineItems.text: It's all in the 'stache. #SEAvLA http://t.co/PhHb9HJh9k

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Seattle Sounders FC 2, LA Galaxy 0. Clint Dempsey (Seattle Sounders FC) left footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Clint Dempsey laser blast sneaks by Jaime Penedo

timelineItems.name: rahurtado
timelineItems.text: #LAGalaxy need to settle down. They were in control and then the Sounders gained a huge momentum swing with the goal...

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 31 - Brad Evans had played 31 games since scoring in @MLS, he last scored in October 2013 against Colorado. Timing. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Alex Schieferdecker
timelineItems.text: Galaxy getting absolutely worked these last five minutes. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: A glorious night for some soccer. #SEAvLA #FirstToFive http://t.co/CAQUjRIOyr

timelineItems.name: B Larsen | Arsenal
timelineItems.text: Oh noooooo. What an opening 30' from Seattle. LA looks completely off the pace! #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: 32’ - Ball whipped in by Yedlin who sees the cross bounce out to Clint WHO ROCKETS IT UNDER PENEDO!!! 2-0 Seattle. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Deuce! 2-0, @SoundersFC. #SEAvLA http://t.co/xFN7SWhPuK

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Electric for 90+ #MLSPlayoffs #SEAvLA https://t.co/P4aXTMEFsG

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Leonardo and his playoff beard looking focused. http://t.co/iUhC5bPMBx #SEAvLA #FirstToFive http://t.co/adNbAenqBT

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 3 - @LAGalaxy have yet to concede a goal in three playoff games in @MLS 2014. Unblemished. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Patrick Patulot
timelineItems.text: 2nd leg of the western conference championship! #gosounders #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Patrick He
timelineItems.text: Opening Ceremony! #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/GKd2J5sKdF

timelineItems.name: Jake Catanese
timelineItems.text: Jaime Penedo, meet Rob Green. Rob meet Jaime, you guys have the same nightmare at the moment... #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Erik Weber
timelineItems.text: Perfect example of how momentum in a soccer game can change in an instant. Incredible. #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Nick Green
timelineItems.text: That was careless defending by @Omar4Gonzalez on the second goal. #LAGalaxy must break this momentum. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.desc: Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Marcelo Sarvas is the first in the book

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: Also, no yellow card accumulation for MLS Cup now. Only a red card tonight gets you suspended for next weekend. #LAGalaxy #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡Ahora mismo por las cadenas de ESPN en EE.UU. y Latinoamérica! ¿Quién avanza? ---> http://t.co/ADUixFUBEH #SEAvLA http://t.co/IqtVaYKExo

timelineItems.name: mhari_dubh
timelineItems.text: #EBFG

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Scarves up. Game on. Tune into @ESPN for #SEAvLA now. #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/uBe93X8o1Q http://t.co/FgbAZxXxUF

timelineItems.name: Megan Diana
timelineItems.text: starting eleven fanfare #MLSPlayoffs #ebfg  #Sounders

timelineItems.name: Ryan Rosenblatt
timelineItems.text: I can't remember an MLS match where the narrative and optics of two clubs could completely change. This is really cool. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Gregor Tankor
timelineItems.text: Xander! Nice gesture there from the Sounders organization and their supporters for singing his name. Off to a great start! #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: If #LAGalaxy can score, I think they're through. Seattle would need three goals. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: KICKTV
timelineItems.text: This and so much more at stake. #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/mqfa0kTIew http://t.co/GCu1xToEnl

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Se llegó la hora. #VamosPorLaQuinta #SEAvLA http://t.co/DDlfZs4UY6

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: #SEAvLA tifo by @WeAreECS: "You can always count on us." #MLSPlayoffs http://t.co/RYul5gufkS

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Brad Evans has a potty mouth. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Paul S-H
timelineItems.text: Why is everyone bagging on Penedo for having a shot deflected a few yards in front of him? #SEAvLA

timelineItems.comment: Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Marcelo Sarvas (LA Galaxy).

timelineItems.name: Sounders Matchday
timelineItems.text: Your @SoundersFC in those LOVELY Rave Green kits. Green tops, blue shorts, green socks. Just stunning. LA in black. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: AOShreveport-Bossier
timelineItems.text: In all likelihood, tonight is the last night Dempsey and Donovan will ever share a field. Thanks boys, for everything. #USMNT #SEAvLA

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner by Stefan Frei.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Stefan Frei parries away a Robbie Keane curler

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: How important are away goals? If the Galaxy get one they’ll be leading. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.text: Here's Brad Evans' opening goal for @SoundersFC: http://t.co/chB8b3suOl #SEAvLA http://t.co/G5WUt8sxr6

timelineItems.text: Primer gol de Dempsey en los Playoffs con @SoundersFC y por ahora están en la final: http://t.co/2HMAdQqv54 #SEAvLA http://t.co/RchzUQHgXR

timelineItems.name: Paul Clark
timelineItems.text: GOOAAALLLLLLL!!! #SEAvLA #gosounders

timelineItems.name: Jen Morrison
timelineItems.text: Sunday, Soccer & #Sounders - this is a good night!! #SeavLA

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: Good hit from Keane. Galaxy still need just a goal and they'd go through to the Final. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: laura mcfayden
timelineItems.text: There was a yellow pulled out somewhere. LA's putting on some pressure. Dempsey yelled at someone. Soccer. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: SoCalSound San Diego
timelineItems.text: Leonardo and Dempsey having a war of words since the opening words. By the looks of the scoreboard, I think we're winning so far... #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Daily Soccer Posts
timelineItems.text: #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: John L
timelineItems.text: I'm actually really pumped for this #SEAvLA match. Hope it lives up to yesterday's game

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 4' Stefan Ishizaki was just launching bombs into the back of the net during training. You can tell that he's feeling it early. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 39' #LAGalaxy really need Landon Donovan to get more involved in this game. He's been largely absent so far. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Robbie Keane (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Landon Donovan.

timelineItems.name: Jhony Gutierrez
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki has good ideas, they just happen to go along with horrible execution. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Not going out without a fight. #SEAvLA #FirstToFive http://t.co/U6GbRzKuSK

timelineItems.name: Jeff Milby
timelineItems.text: Robbie Keane seems determined to score tonight. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Steven J. Camargo
timelineItems.text: Rogers is having a terrible game. So is Omar. LA defense is looking really poor #Galaxy #SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: Being able to hear the chanting and singing from the crowd on tv is kinda awesome #SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: This game👌#SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: Sarvas needs to take that shot, not get two more passes to have Leonardo shoot. #LAGalaxy #SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: No quote unquote Squawka 'chances' created nor shots attempted by the Sounders this half. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: Starting to feel like Marco Pappa time #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.text: I've seen Mike Azira score a playoff game-winner. So, there's that. #USLPRO #MLSPlayoffs #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Total MLS
timelineItems.text: It Gordon scored a bicycle there we were shutting down the season. And the league. Forever. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: Bruce will never learn. Experience tells us that Zardes is a bad winger and this move hurts the attack. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Another goal coming in this one. My money is on LA. #SEAvLA #MLSPlayoffs

timelineItems.name: Rob Burns

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Landon Donovan (LA Galaxy) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Robbie Keane.

timelineItems.desc:
This Sunday's 2nd leg of the Western Conference Championship has been over a year in the making for the Seattle Sounders and LA Galaxy. Both teams are looking to redeem heartbreaking losses in the 2013 MLS Cup Playoffs and book a ticket to the 2014 MLS Cup.

For more coverage of the 2014 MLS Cup Playoffs, presented by AT&T visit: http://www.mlssoccer.com/mlscup/2014
timelineItems.title: SEA vs. LA: It all comes down to this | MLS Cup Playoffs presented by AT&T

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: SHOT LANDON! This game is end-to-end. Everyone take deep breaths. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: In the NHL, that head shot on Robbie Rogers would have been a 5 game suspension. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Matt Pollard
timelineItems.text: LA is hanging on by route one to Gordon right now. #LAGalaxy #SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: Is it possible to have a stroke and a heart attach at the same time? #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.text: this is Seattle pulling out all the stops. Most critical minutes of the playoff series are upon us. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: This is the 5th time these 2 teams have met in 2014. Just think about that... #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Corner Of The Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Ishizaki gets tackled poorly by Zach Scott. Zach Scott’s new nickname is 5-yellow-Scott. #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Ben Hickey
timelineItems.text: A lot of nervous tension early on, plenty of bad giveaways so far from Seattle. Being well pressed by the Galaxy. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Adam Serrano
timelineItems.text: 8' Quite apparent that the #LAGalaxy are not going to give the Sounders a lot of time and space in this one. Hard fought early. #SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: Here's tonight's super handsome starting XI. #SEAvLA #FirstToFive

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: So close. Tick tock. We are minutes away from knowing who New England will face next week. #SEAvLA

Obafemi Martins (Seattle Sounders FC) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Mary DeMarco Young
timelineItems.text: Really wish the Galaxy would hang on to the ball so they don't give up the lead... #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Rob Burns
timelineItems.text: It is now #squeakybum time for #SoundersFC. They still need one goal to take this series away from #LAGalaxy. 4 minutes of stoppage time.

timelineItems.desc: Jaime Penedo (LA Galaxy) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Jaime Penedo booked for time wasting

timelineItems.name: Mary DeMarco Young
timelineItems.text: Love Dempsey and Donovan but with LD's last season really want Galaxy to go through to the final #SEAvLA

timelineItems.name: Women United FC
timelineItems.text: Robbie Rogers. Has been remarkably dedicated this match. Even without a mustache... #LAGalaxy

timelineItems.name: Mike McCall
timelineItems.text: That open shot Obafemi Martins put into the Peugeot Sound during the first half... #Sounders #SEAvLA

timelineItems.text: Will we find out later that Martins has been playing this whole game injured?#SEAvLA SEAvLA

timelineItems.desc: Katie Witham is in Seattle and catches up with a few diehard LA Galaxy fans ahead of the Western Conference Championship Leg 2 match on Sunday, November 30th.
timelineItems.title: LA Galaxy fans confident in victory over the Seattle Sounders | MLS Now
